T.query: select s.stat_id from instances i join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.instance_id where s.instance_id =132 or s.idx_tup_read >80000000 or s.dbname = 'obp' or s.idx_scan = 1 or s.stat_id = 1504532 or i.platform='mysql' or i.cpu = 8 or i.environment = 'dba'

F.query: select s.stat_id from instances i join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.instance_id where s.instance_id =132 or s.idx_tup_read >90000000 or s.dbname = 'obp' or s.idx_scan = 1 or s.stat_id = 1504532 or i.platform='mysql' or i.cpu = 8 or i.environment = 'dba'
